basics.name: Nguyen Hoang Long
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I am a .NET Developer with {{ yoe }} years of experience, passionate about learning new technologies and applying best practices. I am hardworking, self-motivated, and responsible, and I aim to grow into a senior developer while contributing meaningful value to your organization.

location.address: 58/5D, Street No. 9, Linh Tay Ward, Thu Duc City

work.name: BLogic Systems
work.summary: BLogic Dashboard is a support application designed for POS systems. It helps agents manage merchants through a hierarchical model, create support tickets, and generate registration forms using DocuSign. It also integrates with external systems such as TSYS to handle legal documentation.
highlights: Developing and maintaining web applications using .NET, C#, and SQL Server. Collaborating with the team to implement new features and fix bugs.
responsibilities: Analyzed and clarified customer requirements, then planned development tasks for each module.
Built the codebase, designed the database schema, and developed new modules with optimized SQL queries.
Set up and maintained CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, deploying applications to a Linux server environment.
Integrated the system with TSYS payment processing services.

work.name: Silicon Stack
work.summary: Assisting in the development and maintenance of software applications using Python and Django. Collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure quality and timely delivery of software solutions.
highlights: Contributed to a major project that streamlined internal workflows, improving efficiency by 30%
responsibilities: Developed and maintained backend services using Python and Django.
Worked closely with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.
Participated in daily stand-ups and bi-weekly sprint planning meetings to ensure alignment with project goals.
achievements: Successfully implemented a feature that enhanced user authentication, improving security measures.
